title: Bacteria play a central biological role 2

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Bacteria play central biological roles.
content.question: Explain how bacteria can be altered to make genetically engineered products.

frqParts.text: Explain how bacteria can be altered to make genetically engineered products.
